pullRequest.title: environment changes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes to how environment variables are handled.

The environment variables are only used to initialize configurations if they are not present.
The environment override flag has been removed.
New environment variables for resetting authentication has been added.

commit.message: feat: Make environment variables only initialize new config.
feat: Add environment variables for resetting defaults.
feat: Initial implementation of component to override config.
feat: Implement changes to reset LDAP, SAML, and admin password.
test: Add unit tests for config utility.
refactor: Update headers and make a class serializable.
build: Add environment variable for docker swarm.
feat: Swarm deployment check if database exists.

nodes.bodyText: I was initially confused because I thought this returned an Optional. Let's change the method name from getConfigurationByDescriptorKeyAndContext to getConfigurationsByDescriptorKeyAndContext (making configuration plural).

You access key and context by referencing the fields directly but in other places in this class you use the getKey() method. Can we make this more consistent? Either access the fields or use the get methods.
I know this is probably not part of this PR but why is this COMMON_CONFIG_NAME and not DEFAULT_CONFIG_NAME?
Same as above, why isnt this DEFAULT_CONFIG_ENABLED ?

commit.message: fix: Update the descritpor key for LDAP and SAML fields.
